name: DiabeticProximalNeuropathyOrDiabeticAmyotrophy
title: Diabetic Proximal Neuropathy or Diabetic Amyotrophy
description: Documented diagnosis of diabetic proximal neuropathy/diabetic amyotrophy.  (Business ID: Entry 1827291)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Diabetic Proximal Neuropathy or Diabetic Amyotrophy.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an documented diagnosis of diabetic proximal neuropathy/diabetic amyotrophy. .),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Diabetic Proximal Neuropathy or Diabetic Amyotrophy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Diabetic Proximal Neuropathy or Diabetic Amyotrophy.)
